name: Surging Strikes
description: You strike the target three times in a single fluid motion. Make three melee attacks against a single target, each with -5 to your attack roll. On a hit, you deal 1d6 + 5 + MOVE water damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d8 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 3d6 at level 17.
